main event: A UFO was reported sighted in Mammoth, Arizona, on 22 January 1965, described as bright white lights in a triangular formation.
interesting points: The sighting included three white lights in a triangular formation about the size of a small car., The object appeared to be stationary and was observed for approximately 3-4 minutes., No sound was heard during the sighting., The incident was assessed as a possible light source at low altitude, possibly a searchlight., There were no additional witnesses or photographic evidence available.
sighted object: three bright white lights in a triangular formation
